College_Summary: IIM Bodh Gaya, established in 2015 is one of the prestigious management institutes, which has been ranked 53rd among the top management institutes in India by NIRF 2023. IIM Bodh Gaya offers MBA, IPM and PhD courses in various areas of management. IIM Bodh Gaya MBA fees is 17 Lakhs whereas IIM Bodh Gaya Average Package stood at INR 15.68 LPA.

International School of Management Patna or popularly known as ISM Patna was established in the year 2011 and is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). The institute offers a Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) course to the students. The admission process is merit-based and the institute accepts scores of the exams like CAT/ XAT/ MAT/ CMAT. ISM Patna has signed an MoU with the SolBridge University, South Korea. It will provide the students with an opportunity to spend one trimester in South Korea without any extra tuition fee.

IIT Patna, or the Indian Institute of Technology Patna has been declared as an Institute of National Importance by the Government of India. It is a public research university and one of the eight new IITs established by the Government of India's Ministry of Human Resource Development having been established by an act of the Indian Parliament on August 6, 2008. IIT Patna is approved by UGC and AICTE. IIT Patna offers a variety of BS, BTech, MTech, MSc, and PhD programs in eleven departments and streams.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] {Hons.} (Computer Science and Data Analytics)

College_Summary: National Institute of Fashion Technology (NIFT) Patna is a government institute, located in Patna, Bihar. The institute was established in the year 2008 under the Ministry of Textiles of the Government of India. NIFT Patna offers UG & PG courses in the field of fashion, designing, technology, and management. Additionally, the institute offers a one-year certificate course in Continuing Education (CE) Programme in Fashion and Clothing Technology. NIFT Patna Admissions to all courses are done based on the NIFT entrance examination followed by a personal interview.

College_Summary: Chandragupt Institute of Management Patna (CIMP), Patna was established as an autonomous institution in 2008 with active support from the Government of Bihar. Since then CIMP has been contributing substantially to the academic and development credentials of Bihar while fulfilling the primary role of training students to become professional managers. CIMP offers a Post Graduate Diploma in Management, Fellow Program and an Executive Program in Management (for working professionals) sponsored by the Government of Bihar. In a short span of 12 years, CIMP’s achievements are known to the corporate world and have been able to place its graduates in various companies of national and international repute.Direct Link to Apply for CIMP Admission

College_Summary: Tilka Manjhi Bhagalpur University (TMBU) was formerly known as Bhagalpur University. Established in 1960, TMBU is sprawled over areas of 264 acres, this pedagogical university has 12 constituent colleges, 25 affiliated colleges Govt. funded, and 4 research institutes. The hardship of the teaching members and students has bagged ‘Grade B’ accreditation from NAAC. The university has a whole number of 130000 students in the UG curriculum and in the PG program, there are 6200 students.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc] +  Master of Library and Information Science [M.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Summary: Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University (RPCAU), Samastipur is one of the prominent universities specializing in Agricultural studies. Being established in 1970, Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University, Samastipur has made its reputation as one of the best colleges for agricultural studies by offering various courses at Graduate, Postgraduate, and Research courses. the specializations offered by the universities are BSc, B.Tech., MSc, MBA, M.Tech. and Research in the Agricultural and allied courses. As the university is a public university it is one of the demanding colleges by the students wanting to flourish their career in agricultural activities. Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University, Samastipur offers admission to its courses on the basis of scores obtained in the All India Entrance Examination in Agriculture and Allied Science which is conducted by ICAR.

Gaya College was established in the year 1944. It is recognized by UGC & is affiliated to Magadh University, Bodh Gaya. The college offers various Undergraduate, Post Graduate and also professional courses. Admissions to the courses are the basis of merit and applications are accepted both online & offline. The college includes all the necessary facilities for the better learning environment of its students.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Name: Tapindu Institute of Higher Studies - [TIHS], Patna

College_Summary: Lalit Narayan Mishra Institute of Economic Development and Social Change, also known as L.N.M.I. Patna is one of the oldest and top management institutes located at the heart of Bihar. It is an autonomous institute that is affiliated with Aryabhatta Knowledge University and recognized by UGC. The Institute holds the approval of the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), Ministry of HRD.

Established in 1883, T.N.B College is a constituent college of T.M. Bhagalpur University. The college is a very prominent institution and is located in Bhagalpur which joins two important cities, Patna and Kolkata. At present the college offers undergraduate courses in almost all fields of Science and Arts. In addition, it also offers PG and research level courses in some disciplines. The college has been accredited grade ‘A’ by NAAC.

Magadh Mahila College, established in 1946, is affiliated with Patna University and has been accredited B+ grade by NAAC. All the undergraduate and postgraduate courses offered by the institute have been recognized by Patna University. In order to take admission to undergraduate 3-year degree courses, candidates must have a minimum of 45% at the Intermediate Examination from a recognized board. Admission to the B.Com course is done on the basis of Merit-Based. For postgraduate courses, candidates are selected on the basis of entrance exams and interviews at Magadh Mahila College.

NIT Patna is an autonomous university, established in 1886. In the overall category, NIT Patna is ranked 41 by NIRF 2023 in Engineering category. The institute's BTech in the CSE branch and BArch degrees are its two most popular course offerings. JEE Main exam scores and NATA scores, respectively, are used to determine admission to these programmes.

College_Summary: Founded in

Magadh University is a state-public university located in Bodh Gaya, Bihar. The university is approved by the UGC and accredited with a "C" grade by the NAAC. It is the largest university in Bihar with a campus sprawling over 460-acres, which comprises 24 PG departments and 44 constituent colleges. Besides that, there are 175 Magadh University affiliated colleges. At present, Magadh University is offering UG, PG, Doctoral, Diploma, and vocational degree courses in various fields. Recognized by the Directorate of Distance Education (DDE), Magadh University is also offering distance education through its affiliated colleges.

College_Name: Sattar Memorial College of Education, Patna
Mirza Ghalib Teacher's Training College - [MGTTC], Patna

College_Summary: Patna Women’s College was established in 1940. The college offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate and PG Diploma courses in the science, commerce and arts stream. Eligibility for UG courses requires a minimum of 50% in 10 + 2 whereas for PG and PG Diploma require a graduation degree from a recognized university. Admission to all the courses is determined by the scores obtained by the candidate in PUCET followed by an interview. The admission process is solely online and centralized by the government.

College_Summary: Sandip University, Madhubani Bihar is one of the most renowned private universities located in Sijoul of Madhubani District, Bihar. The University offers multiple courses at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels in different fields including Engineering, Computer Science, Commerce and Management, and Education. Graduates from the university are placed in top recruiting companies such as Amazon, TCS, BYJU’s, etc. Admission to SUN is both merit and entrance-based and the accepted scores for the same are JEE Main and SU JEE.

College_Name: College of Commerce, Arts & Science, Patna
College_Summary: College of Commerce (COC), Patna was established in 1949. It is a constituent unit and Post Graduate Centre of Magadh University, Bodh Gaya (Bihar, India) duly recognized by University Grants Commission, New Delhi under section 12(f) and 12(B). In 1952, the college got affiliated to Bihar University, Muzaffarpur. The mission of the college is catering education to all providing equal opportunity to poor and downtrodden. The vision of the college is to create a class of intellectually, morally or spiritually sound and committed citizens, who will become a human resource of high calibre, to cater the needs of the society and the country.

Patna University is one of the oldest universities in Bihar, located in Patna. Founded in 1917, the UGC-approved university has been accredited by NAAC with a "B" grade. The University campus is spread across a sprawling 181.58 acres of land in the state of Bihar.

Government Engineering College, Gopalganj is an engineering college set by the Government of Bihar in the beautiful city of Gopalganj. The college was established under the Department of Science and Technology in the year 2019. This college is a newly settled and currently growing technical institution. The college is affiliated with Aryabhatta Knowledge University (AKU) and approved by All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE). The college started its first academic session in 2019 from the Campus of Braj Kishor Narayan Singh Government Polytechnic, Gopalganj (BKNSGP), Gopalganj. The prime aim of this Institution is to enhance students with sound knowledge, acumen, training, and experience both at the academic level of Engineering and in a highly competitive global market. GEC, Gopalganj encourages and motivates its students to dedicatedly strive for the best and achieve excellence by way of inclusiveness, integrity, innovation and creativity.

Amity University, Patna is a private university that was established in the year 2017 by the Amity Education Group. It is located in Patna, Bihar, and is approved by UGC. This institute offers Undergraduate & Postgraduate courses in the field of Commerce, Computer Science, Engineering, Management, Law, English Literature & Journalism. It has state-of-the-art infrastructure and facilities.

Aryabhatta Knowledge University, also known as AKU Patna has been established by Government of Bihar for the development and management of educational infrastructure related to technical, medical, management and allied professional education in the state.

Bhagalpur College of Engineering, referred to as BCE, was established in 1960 in Bihar. The college offers B.Tech and B.Tech lateral courses in 5 specializations. It also launched the M.Tech programs in 2 specializations in the academic session 2019-20. Admissions to all courses are on the basis of entrance examinations. The UG courses admissions are based on JEE Mains scores, while PG courses are based on GATE scores. Counseling is conducted by the BCECE board through UG EAC and PG EAC.

Birla Institute of Technology, Patna, also referred to as BIT Patna, is an extension of BIT, Mesra campus. It offers 4 UG courses in a total of 10 specializations: B.Tech, BBA, BCA, and B.Arch. There are also MBA and M.Tech as PG courses, and 9 specializations in Ph.D. Admissions to the BBA and BCA courses are merit-based, while admissions to all other courses are entrance based. The top recruiters of the college include Accenture, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, etc.

Patna College, located in the capital city of Bihar is founded in the year 1863. It offers undergraduate courses in the field of arts, science, and commerce. It remains as most popular college in Bihar for the faculty of Arts. The college is affiliated with Patna University which is known to offer postgraduate courses in the same subjects. Apart from its UG Courses, Patna College is known for offering courses in foreign languages.

Gaya College Of Engineering was established in 1981 under the Government of Bihar. GCE, Gaya offers undergraduate courses i.e., B.Tech and postgraduate courses across 4 engineering and 1 science and humanities department. Under the UG program, it offers B.Tech in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering. Admission to the college is via entrance exam (BCECE) which has two rounds, screening, and mains Examination followed by counselling.

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, DCI, AICTE, PCI, INC, MCI, BCI, UGC

College_Summary: Gopal Narayan Singh University (GNSU) Sasaram, was established in the year 2018, It is one of the six private universities in Bihar. The college is recognized by the University Grants Commission. The institution supports and believes in providing the best education in every field, they have 50+ acres of campus that encompasses a cutting edge Faculty in Medical College & Hospital, Management Studies, Commerce, Nursing, Information Technology, Law, Pharmacy, Paramedical Sciences, Agriculture Science, Mass Communication & Journalism, Department of Library & Information Sciences, and the Department of Education. The private university offers courses in Under Graduation, Post Graduation, Diploma, Integrated, and Doctoral.

College_Summary: St Xavier’s College of Management and Technology Patna is a prestigious management institute established in the year 2012. Presently, the college is running BCP, BCA, BBA, BBE & BBM courses at the undergraduate level. It is affiliated to Aryabhatta Knowledge University. The college aims at maintaining a high level of excellence in academics and focuses on the all-round development of the students. Top companies recruit students from this college with a good salary package

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts [BA] (Journalism and Mass Communication)

College_Name: Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology - [NSIT], Patna
College_Summary: Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology is the private engineering college established with the approval of AICTE. It is affiliated to Aryabhata Knowledge University, Patna. The institute offers courses in the field of engineering. Admissions are done on the basis of national entrance exams i.e JEE Main and BPTPIA scores. The institute has training and placement cell to enhance the skills of the student to be placed in good companies. Almost 80% of students have been placed in good companies.

Muzaffarpur Institute of Technology often referred to as MIT, is a government higher education institution administered by the Department of Science & Technology and funded by the Bihar Government. The college offers UG and PG programs in Engineering and Pharmacy. Admission to UG programs is based on the BCECE Entrance Exam, conducted by Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board. For admission to PG, candidates have to appear in the Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE). The top recruiters are Alstom, HCL, Wipro, Info Tech, Prism Cement, TATA, and multiple others.

Nalanda College of Engineering (NCE), Chandi is a governmental engineering college established under the guidance of Shri Nitish Kumar (CM of Bihar). The college aims at offering B.Tech programs in four specializations, namely, Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering. Candidates looking for admission to the college should appear for the BCECE conducted by the Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board. The application process for the admission is online, and students must fill up all the required entries along with the required documents.

Bakhtiyarpur College of Engineering (BCE), Patna is a newly set up Government Engineering College established in the year 2016.  The college is affiliated to Aryabhatta Knowledge University and approved by AICTE. BCE Patna presently offers a Bachelor of Technology program across 4 streams. It aims at providing quality education to students in the field of science & Technology and also encourages them to explore the joy of learning.

Darbhanga College of Engineering some time ago known as JMIT is well known for its scholastic magnificence in engineering sciences.  The organization aims to produce top class engineers, and is the main center for research work and specific studies. They offer scholarly and proficient projects at Undergraduate level in Engineering, Science & Eng. Civil, Mechanical and EEE. Darbhanga School goes for developing the general aptitude of students through interactive sessions with their tutors, standard conceptualizing in gathering discussions and presentation on several occasions. The Darbhanga College offers an agile and enthusiastic social environment that helps in additional curricular improvement and knowing the budding talent of its students.

Motihari College of Engineering was established in 1980, it is a government college which is fully funded by the Government of Bihar. The college is affiliated with the Aryabhatta Knowledge University (AKU) and is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). The college currently offers B.Tech courses in 4 different disciplines which are Computer Science & Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering. The institute also plans to start the M.Tech program in Computer Science & Engineering from July 2020 onwards after receiving mandatory approval from the AICTE.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Technology [M.Tech] (Computer Science and Engineering)

College_Summary: Central Institute of Plastics Engineering and Technology (CIPET), Hajipur is Govt. College which was established in the year 1994 to cater to the needs of Plastics Industries in Bihar & other adjacent regions. The college is situated in the sacred land of Vaishali, Bihar. The facilities of the college have been modernized through World Bank/ OIDB assistance. The college is well equipped with the latest audiovisual facilities and computers with advanced CAD software. The testing laboratory is accredited by National Accreditation Board for Testing and Calibration Laboratories (NABL), Department of Science and Technology, Government of India.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Plastics Processing and Testing

College_Summary: LNJPIT was established in year 2012 and was established by Government of Bihar and governed by Aryabhatta Knowledge University. The Institute is recognized by AICTE. It is the seventh-best engineering college in state of Bihar.

Purnea College Of Engineering is one of the brand new government engineering colleges established in 2017. This college offers B.Tech courses in four main branches Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. Each course can accept 60 seats and 240 students in total by AICTE, New Delhi approved. Admission to the course will be based on the marks obtained in either JEE or BCECE. The application mode is online.

Bihar National College was established in 1989. It is one of the biggest and oldest multi-faculty colleges of the state imparting degree level teaching in almost all the subjects of Arts and Science and upto post graduate level in some selected subjects. The college is most centrally located in Patna occupying an area of approximately 8.0 acres of land containing separate blocks for different science departments

Courses_Details.Course Name: Certificate Course in Nutrition and Dietetics

College_Summary: Saharsa College of Engineering, located in Saharsa, Bihar, is one of the premier institutions of engineering in Bihar and the country at large. It is a 40-acres institute which provides many facilities to the students such as Computer centre, hostel, sports facilities, central library, medical facilities, gymnasium, bank, Wi-Fi and many more.

With its first academic year recorded in 2017, Supaul College of Engineering is a newly established co-ed college of Supaul, Bihar. It was set up by the Government of Bihar under the Department of Science and Technology. It is affiliated to Aryabhatta Knowledge University (AKU Patna).

College_Name: Millia Institute of Technology, Purnea Overview
College_Summary: Millia Institute of Technology (MIT), Purnea, established in 2002, is approved by AICTE, Govt. of Bihar and affiliated to Purnea University. It offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering and Technology and Management.

Sityog Institute of Technology, Aurangabad, established in 2002, is a prestigious engineering institute approved by AICTE, CSAB, AKU, and State Board of Technical Education. The college provides UG courses in various disciplines and also offers Polytechnic Diploma courses.

College_Name: Vidya Vihar Institute of Technology - [VVIT], Purnea
College_Summary: Vidya Vihar Institute of Technology (VVIT), is a leading technical college in Bihar. The institute is managed by Vidya Vihar Educational Trust. The aim of the college is to create high-quality professionals in all the field of engineering by endorsing all-around development of the students. Its mission has always been to become the top college at the national level and a front runner in educational & socioeconomic growth   by giving top quality of education to students coming from all over the India. The college even has its placement cell which is always working for their students to get them placed in the top companies. The National Conference on Information Science and Technology also happened in college in March (2014).

Established in the year 2018, Al-Karim University, Katihar, Bihar, has created quite a name for itself over the years. It is recognised by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and approved by the Medical Council of India. It offers various Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in the fields of Medicine and Science.

Shershah Engineering College, popularly known as (SEC) is a government engineering college that was established in 2016 situated in Sasaram, Bihar. The institute offers 4 years B.tech course in Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering Electrical & Electronics Engineering. The college admission is done purely based on the entrance exam Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board (BCECEB)/ JEE Main. The application mode is online.

College_Name: Maulana Azad College of Engineering and Technology - [MACET], Patna
R.P. Sharma Institute of Technology, Patna
College_Summary: R.P. Sharma Institute of Technology (RPSIT), Patna is a private institute established in 1980, affiliated to Aryabhatta Knowledge University and approved by AICTE and Govt. of Bihar. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology, Management and Polytechnic.

Sitamarhi Institute of Technology, Bihar was established in the year 2016. It’s an engineering college situated in Patna and has been affiliated with Aryabhatta Knowledge University and is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education, New Delhi. It offers 4 years of B.tech courses in 4 different streams like Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and Computer Science & Engineering. It takes admission through BCECE, Bihar, and maintains the excellent result from the past 4 years.

Established in 2018, Government Engineering College (GEC), Vaishali is a state government college for engineering. It is set up by the government of Bihar under the Department of Science and Technology.

Adwaita Mission Institute of Technology- [AMIT], Banka
College_Summary: Adwaita Mission Institute of Technology was established in the year 2013 and is affiliated to Aryabhatta Knowledge University, Patna. The Institute is approved by the All India Council For Technical Education (AICTE), Ministry of HRD, and Government of India.

College_Name: Indian Institute of Information Technology - [IIIT], Bhagalpur
College_Summary: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Bhagalpur (IIIT Bhagalpur) is acknowledged as one of the top new IIITs in India constituted in the year 2017. The institute was set up under the Ministry of HRD, Govt. of India. It offers B.Tech at the UG level across three valuable specializations. The institute is envisaged to provide high-quality education to its diverse group of students so as to transform them into valuable assets for the country.

College_Summary: Dr. C.V. Raman University (CVRU), Vaishali has been established in the year 2018 located in Bhagwanpur, Vaishali Bihar. It is one of the best private universities in India and the first private university in the state of North Bihar. The university functions under the AISECT Group of Universities (AGU). CVRU Bihar offers numerous undergraduate, postgraduate, and research courses in the discipline of Engineering, Management, Arts & Humanities, and many more. Admission to CVRU Vaishali is done on the basis of merit and the AISECT Joint Entrance Exam conducted by the university. Additionally, CVRU also provides placement assistance to its final-year students. The cell organizes many mock drills in various verticals to enhance the quality of the students such as soft skills training, personality development, group discussions, computer languages, etc. Some of the potential recruiters of CVRU are TCS, Himalaya, Cipla, HCL, Infosys, Escorts, Intel, Accenture, and many more.

College_Summary: Braj Mohan Das College, abbreviated as BMD College is a unit of B.R.A.Bihar University, Muzaffarpur. The idea of the College originated in the minds of some freedom fighters and social activists of the region. The College came into existence in 1968 and is situated at Dayalpur in Vaishali district of Bihar. The college has a good infrastructure to attract the students and not only the infrastructure is good but the college also provides a quality education to the students admitted. Various courses are available for different levels. Apart from this, the college also offers other value oriented courses to add benefit to the students.

Bhuwaneshwari Dayal College, also known as BD College, was established in 1970. Formerly an evening college, the institution is affiliated to Patliputra University. It is accredited to NAAC and has secured a B Grade under the same. Bhuwaneshwari Dayal College offers undergraduate courses in Science, Arts, and Commerce streams, and postgraduate courses in Commerce. In addition, it also offers vocational courses. The admission procedure is based on merit in the previous qualifying examinations as well as entrance tests. The application form may be downloaded from the college website or collected from the college office.

Bachelor of Commerce with Banking and Insurance [BBI]
Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Summary: H.D. Jain College Ara, Bihar was established in the year 1942 in Bihar. The college offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in the different domains of Science, Arts, and Commerce. These courses include B.A., B.Com., B.Sc., M.A., M.Com., M.Sc., BBA, BSc. (IT) and E-Commerce. Admissions to all the courses is done on the basis of merit of the qualifying examinations. Candidates may either fill the form online or offline (collecting from college premises). After processing the application forms, the college publishes the cut-off list based on which the candidates are selected.

Kanhai Lal Sahu College, Nawada was established in 1957 with an objective to impart higher education to the scholars of the rural and suburban areas of Nawada. In 1978, it became a constituent unit of Magadh University. Nawada is a historical place and is the district's HeadQuarter. This is the only college in the radius of 35 kilometers to provide higher education to the students.

MV College, Buxar, established in the year 1958 is an Arts and Science college offering UG programs in 5 specializations and PG programs in 2 specializations. The selection criteria for all the courses is based on the merit of previous qualifying exams. Students may apply to the courses at MV College, Buxar in both online as well as offline mode. Graduates from the college may earn a minimum of INR 20,000 per month and a maximum of INR 40,000 per month.

Maharani Janki Kunwar College, Purba Champaran, Bihar, is one of the esteemed colleges in Bihar and was established in the year 1955. Maharani Janki Kunwar College is a basic unit of the B. R. Ambedkar Bihar University, Muzaffarpur. The college is located in the central part of Bihar that is in West Champaran. The name of the college was given in the name of late Maharani Janki Kunwar of Bettiah Raj. It is one of the oldest colleges in North Bihar. The green environment of the college flourishes relation with nature and glimmer of knowledge. Students graduated from this college got placed in the best- ranked organization.

Since its inception, Munshi Singh College, Muzaffarpur, has been engaged in imparting world class education and dedicated for the development of unsophisticated qualities in an individual. The College endeavors to endow the immaculate opportunities and ambiance for the compatible evolution of the Student's intellect, and dedicated  to enable them to become well-turned human beings, amenable citizens and a better professional. The College is also striving for upliftment of educational status of economically weaker section of the society, and majority of its students belong to the marginalized sections of the society.

Purnea College, Purnia, established in 1948, is the oldest institution of higher education in this region. Situated on the periphery, adjoining West Bengal in the east and Nepal in the north, the institution is a commemoration of the efforts of the freedom fighters of this area.

Founded in 1969, Ram Briksh Benipuri Mahila (RRBM) College is located at Muzaffarpur, Bihar. It is approved by UGC and is affiliated to B. R. Ambedkar Bihar University. The college offers B.A and B.Sc degree courses across several specializations. Additionally, UGC sponsored vocational courses like BBA and Clinical Nutrition and Dietetics are also available. Admissions to RBBM College is based on merit or an entrance test. The entrance is conducted by the college or affiliated university.

Rajendra College Chapra, established in 1938 is a private college affiliated with J.P. University. The courses offered by university are Undergraduate and postgraduate in arts, science, commerce and vocational education. Admissions are merit based and on first come first served basis.

College_Summary: Ram Krishna College (RKC), Madhubani, Bihar, a Co-educational constituent college of Lalit Narayan Mithila University was established in 1940. The UG course was started in 1940 and the PG course in 1983. The college is A NAAC accredited (B grade).

Ram Vilas Ganga Ram College - [RVGRC], Siwan

College_Summary: Sri Arvind Mahila College is a women’s college established in the year 1960. It is a private college named after famous Indian philosopher Sant Arvindo Ghosh. The college is affiliated to Magadh University. It has also been accredited by NAAC and is approved by UGC. The college offers undergraduate courses in the field of Commerce, Science, Arts along with vocational & add-on courses. College_Summary: Munger University is a state university, located in in Munger, Bihar. Established in 2018, the university is recognised by the UGC and is a part of AIU. Munger University comprises of 17 constituent colleges, 17 affiliated colleges, 5 single faculty education colleges (Affiliated B. Ed. Colleges), and one affiliated law college.

College_Name: Mata Gujri Memorial Medical College & Lions Seva Kendra Hospital, Kishanganj

College_Summary: New Government Polytechnic is located at the Patna city and is one of the oldest Polytechnic colleges of Bihar. The institute was established in 1955 under the department of Science & Technology, Govt. Of Bihar and is recognized by AICTE.

Government Polytechnic Asthawan located at Nalanda is one among the prominent institutes in the Bihar State. It is Affiliated to Department of Science and Technology, Bihar and is approved by AICTE. It was Founded in 2013 but got its approved inaugurated on August 20th of 2015. The college started its first batch in the year of 2015. The college offers diploma courses in the different fields of Engineering. Admission of students is based upon DCECE (Diploma Combined Entrance Examination) and the minimum Eligibility to apply is completion of class 10th or 12th based on the year of entry.

Government Polytechnic Gulzarbagh, Patna is one among the oldest Polytechnic Colleges Established by Government of Bihar. It was started in the year 1954. The college has the availability of Engineering diploma Courses in Eight Different branches and it is a well-known college in Bihar to pursue Diploma Courses in Engineering. Admissions to this college are based upon DCECE (Diploma Combined Entrance Examination) Conducted by Government of Bihar. It has a fully dedicated Faculty which provides students with both practical and theoretical knowledge.

Government Polytechnic Jamui at Bihar was established to impart higher education to the scholars of the rural and suburban areas of Jamui. The college offers diploma degree in the major disciplines of Engineering. The college started its first semester exams in 2018. It admits students by their ranking secured in Diploma Combined Entrance Competitive Examination (DCECE), which is administered by BCECE Board, Bihar State Government. During the COVID-19 pandemic situation, the Civil Engineering department of the college had organized online “Quiz cum Awareness Program” to keep the students motivated.

College_Name: Shri Sai College of Nursing Paramedical - [SSCONP], Patna
College_Summary: Shri Sai College of Nursing and Paramedical (SSCONP), Patna offers nursing and paramedical programmes to create a professional environment based on ethical and moral values. The institute aims to provide high-quality nursing education. SSCONP is recognized by the Health Department, Govt of Bihar. The college is affiliated with Aryabhatt Knowledge University, Patna. The college is associated with Shri Sai Hospital, Patna managed by Dr Akhilesh Kumar Singh. The college offers courses like BSc Nursing, BPT, BMLT, DMLT, BHM, CMD, BOTT, DOTT and DOT.

College_Name: AZMET College of Engineering & Technology, Kishanganj
College_Summary: The Azmet College of Engineering and Technology, situated in the Kishanganj district of Bihar that was set up in 2007. Affiliated under the State Board of Technical Education, Patna, Bihar.

Millia Polytechnic, Purnea, Bihar, one of the emerging institutes under the Millia Educational Trust, Purnea was established in 2008, Situated in Rambagh, Purnea, Bihar. This institute offers various Diploma programs. The admission process is merit-based, the college accepts Bihar Private Combined Entrance Competitive Examination (Under BPTPIA) scores in their counselling process.

Buddha Polytechnic Institute was established in 2008 It is situated in Gaya, Bihar, and is a part of the Buddha group of institutions. This institution is approved by AICTE and affiliated to the State Board of Technical Education, Bihar.

CRK Polytechnic College is located in Bihar. It was established in 2013 by Leelawati Devi Educational Trust to offer the best technical education to the students. Not only the college tries to provide the finest education to the students, but it also caters to the need for extracurricular activities of the students. CRK Polytechnic College has the approval of the AICTE (All India Council for Technical Education) and is affiliated to the State Board of Technical Education, Science and Technology Department Patna, Bihar. CRK Polytechnic College offers Diploma courses in Electrical Engineering, Electronic Engineering, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Computer Science Engineering. Admission to this college is primarily merit-based.

College_Name: Ganga Memorial College of Polytechnic, Nalanda
College_Summary: The Ganga Memorial College of Polytechnic, situated in the Nalanda District of Bihar was established in 2013. Accredited by AICTE, Ganga Memorial College of Polytechnic offers 4 Diploma courses in the domain of engineering.

GEMS Polytechnic College Aurangabad at Ratnapura, Bihar was established in the year 2015 and is run under the Gospel Echoing Missionary Society. The college is approved by the All India Council for Technical College (AICTE). This college offers full-time diploma courses in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical and Electronic, and Computer Science engineering with a period of three years. The admission to the institute is based on the percentage scored in the 10th or 12th standard alone. The application process starts in May/June every year and they also offer scholarships for few candidates.

HiTech Polytechnic College, Bettiah is a small unit of Subhwanti Group of Colleges that falls under Subhwanti-Sudama-Rai Foundation. In 2016, the college received its affiliation from the State Board of Technical Education, Patna. It offers courses related to Engineering and Technology at diploma level. The applicants need to appear in the common entrance conducted by the state authority to become eligible for the admission. A pre-training placement program is offered to the students by the placements cell of the college to make them fit for the industrial jobs.
